options.name: Action : Deadly Poison
options.description: You make an Attack with a Weapon or piece of Ammunition that is coated in Poison and roll a 1d4. If the Attack hits, instead of your Target becoming Poisoned, they take instantaneous Poison Damage as if the Poison lasted a number of rounds equal to the result of the d4.

options.name: Free Action : From the Shadows
options.description: After making an Attack while Hidden, you roll a Stealth Check with a 1d4 Penalty and attempt to remain Hidden.

options.name: Stealth Specialist
options.description: Gain +2 Attack when Hidden or Invisbile and your True Hit threshold is increased by 1.

options.name: Poisoned Blade
options.description: Gain +1 Alchemy and +1 Damage to Piercing Weapons

options.name: Action: Assassinate
options.description: You make a quick and deadly attack with a Light 1 Handed Weapon. If you are Hidden deal an additional 2d8 Damage which is doubled in the event of a True Hit. If you are not Hidden, this Attack deals an extra 1d8 Damage and is also doubled in the event of a True Hit.
